item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，福特因车门饰板脱落风险召回逾 10 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，福特汽车公司将在美国召回10万多辆金牛座（Taurus）汽车，原因是该车存在缺陷，可能导致车门饰板在行驶过程中脱落。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling more than 100,000 Taurus vehicles in the United States due to a defect that could cause door trim to detach while driving, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.】

item.title: 聚焦：伊拉克未能获得美国批准通过伊朗进口土库曼斯坦天然气
item.description: 在美国的压力下，伊拉克试图通过邻国伊朗从土库曼斯坦输送天然气来缓解其长期电力短缺问题的努力失败了，这使得巴格达不得不争相寻找替代方案来维持电力供应。【原文：Iraq's attempt to ease its chronic power shortage with gas from Turkmenistan routed through neighbouring Iran has failed under U.S. pressure, leaving Baghdad scrambling for alternatives to keep the lights on.】

item.title: 主要券商预计英国央行 9 月暂停降息后 2025 年不再降息
item.description: 在英国央行维持关键利率不变之后，包括高盛、花旗集团和摩根大通在内的主要券商预计英国央行今年不会再降息。【原文：Major brokerages including Goldman Sachs, Citigroup and J.P.Morgan expect no more interest rate cuts by the Bank of England this year after the British central bank kept its key rate on hold.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田在新闻发布会上的讲话
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率稳定，但决定开始出售其持有的风险资产，在逐步退出大规模刺激计划残余部分方面又迈出了一步。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Friday but decided to start selling its holdings of risky assets, taking another step forward in phasing out remnants of its massive stimulus programme.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息称中国在与加拿大发生贸易争端后抢购澳大利亚油菜籽
item.description: 三位贸易消息人士告诉路透社，在中国政府上个月对从传统供应国加拿大进口的油菜籽征收初步反倾销税之后，中国国有贸易公司中粮集团已经购买了多达九批 60,000 公吨的澳大利亚油菜籽。【原文：Chinese state trading firm COFCO has bought up to nine 60,000-metric-ton cargoes of Australian canola, three trade sources told Reuters, after Beijing last month imposed preliminary anti-dumping duties on imports of the oilseed from traditional supplier Canada.】

item.title: 英国交易平台 IG 集团收购澳大利亚加密货币交易所
item.description: 英国在线交易平台 IG 集团周五表示，它已以 1.78 亿澳元（1.1741 亿美元）的价格收购了澳大利亚加密货币交易所 Independent Reserve，从而扩大了其在亚太地区的数字产品和业务。【原文：British online trading platform IG Group said on Friday it had acquired Australian cryptocurrency exchange Independent Reserve for A$178 million ($117.41 million), expanding its digital offerings and presence in the Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 消息人士称，通用电气医疗集团正在探索出售中国业务部门
item.description: 一位知情人士周五透露，美国医疗设备制造商通用电气医疗集团（GE Healthcare）正在与顾问合作，探讨其中国业务的各种选择，包括直接出售。【原文：U.S. medical device maker GE Healthcare is working with advisers to explore options for its China unit including an outright sale, a person with knowledge of the discussions said on Friday.】

item.title: 尽管美联储放宽政策，中国仍将维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，在美国联邦储备委员会降息后，中国央行保持关键政策利率稳定，预计下周一中国将连续第四个月维持基准贷款利率不变。【原文：China is expected to leave benchmark lending rates unchanged for the fourth month in a row next Monday, a Reuters survey showed, after the central bank kept a key policy rate steady following the U.S. Federal Reserve's rate cut.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 17 发布会吸引数百人在北京专卖店排起长队
item.description: 周五是 iPhone 17 上市日，数百人在北京的苹果旗舰店排起了长队，这表明该系列手机在世界第二大经济体的销售有了一个良好的开端。【原文：Hundreds of people lined up at Apple’s flagship store in Beijing on the launch day of the iPhone 17 on Friday in a sign that sales of the series are off to a promising start in the world's second largest economy.】

item.title: 全球经济暂时从容应对特朗普冲击
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统上任后的头八个月里，全球经济秩序面临的威胁来势汹汹--从大规模关税冲击到美联储控制权争夺战，甚至还有一种新兴的美国国家资本主义形式。【原文：Threats to the global economic order have come at a furious pace during President Donald Trump's first eight months in office - from a massive tariff shock to a battle for control of the Federal Reserve and even an emerging form of U.S. state capitalism.】

item.title: 独家报道记录显示，FDA尼古丁袋试点将减轻制造商的研究负担
item.description: 内部会议记录显示，美国食品和药物管理局将根据一项新的试点计划放宽对尼古丁袋制造商的要求，这是特朗普领导的白宫对吸烟替代品采取更柔和立场的第一个明显迹象。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration will ease requirements on nicotine pouch manufacturers under a new pilot program, internal meeting transcripts show, in the first clear sign of a softer stance on smoking alternatives under Trump's White House.】

item.title: 早间竞价：日本央行按兵不动，偏向鹰派
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，收购集团 EQT 启动北欧宽带和数据中心业务的出售工作
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，EQT 已开始出售其北欧超高速宽带网络和数据中心业务 GlobalConnect。【原文：EQT has launched the sale of its Nordic superfast broadband network and data centre business GlobalConnect, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: VIEW 投资者对日本央行维持利率稳定决定的反应
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率稳定，但决定开始出售其持有的风险资产，在逐步退出大规模刺激计划残余部分方面又迈出了一步。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Friday but decided to start selling its holdings of risky assets, taking another step forward in phasing out remnants of its massive stimulus programme.】

item.title: 报告称特朗普政策威胁美国清洁能源就业引擎
item.description: 上周五发表的一份研究报告显示，去年太阳能、风能和其他清洁能源行业的就业岗位增长速度是美国其他行业的三倍，该报告警告说，由于特朗普政府努力阻止可再生能源的发展，其中许多岗位可能会消失。【原文：Jobs in solar, wind and other clean energy industries grew three times faster than in the rest of the U.S. workforce last year, according to a study published on Friday, warning that many of them could go due to Trump administration efforts to block renewables.】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平寻求通过 TikTok 打破中美僵局
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平将于周五寻求达成一项协议，以帮助视频应用 TikTok 继续在美国上线，并缓解两个超级大国之间因贸易问题陷入对峙的紧张局势。【原文：President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping will seek an agreement on Friday to help keep the video app TikTok online in the U.S. and ease tensions between two superpowers locked in a standoff over trade.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团股票在 SEBI 驳回兴登堡指控后攀升
item.description: 在印度市场监管部门驳回做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）对亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）及其集团操纵股票的指控一天后，阿达尼集团的股票周五上涨了 1% 至 9.6%。【原文：Adani Group stocks gained between 1% and 9.6% on Friday, a day after India's markets regulator dismissed short-seller Hindenburg Research's allegations of stock manipulation against billionaire Gautam Adani and his group.】

item.title: 美国法院支持 Elliott 关联公司竞购 Citgo 母公司
item.description: 一名美国法官周四允许对冲基金埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司通过法院下令的股票拍卖完成对委内瑞拉所有的 Citgo Petroleum 母公司的收购，同时限制竞争对手 Gold Reserve 也这样做。【原文：A U.S. judge allowed an affiliate of hedge fund Elliott Investment Management on Thursday to move towards completing its offer for Venezuela-owned Citgo Petroleum's parent through a court-ordered auction of shares, while restricting rival bidder Gold Reserve from doing the same.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，韩国 LG 能源公司在特朗普上台之前就在使用美国签证变通办法
item.description: 内部文件显示，早在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任总统、其政府发起大规模镇压行动、拘留数百名 LG 员工之前，韩国 LG 能源解决方案公司（LG Energy Solution）就在使用变通办法来应对美国签证限制。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution was using workarounds to U.S. visa restrictions well before Donald Trump returned as president and his administration launched a massive crackdown that detained hundreds of LG workers, internal documents show.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将以上涨结束央行大选周，日经指数创纪录
item.description: 受全球采取更多货币刺激措施的希望提振，亚洲股市本周将以大阳线报收，而日经指数则因预期日本央行将再次不加息而创下历史新高。【原文：Asian shares are set to end a big central week in positive territory, buoyed by hopes of more monetary stimulus around the world, while the Nikkei notched a record aided by expectations the Bank of Japan would again skip a rate hike.】

item.title: 美元走稳，投资者考虑美联储会议后的前景，焦点转向日本央行会议
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，美元基本持稳，投资者期待美联储会议后出现新的催化剂，美元兑日元在日本央行做出政策决定前逐步走高。【原文：The U.S. dollar held largely steady in early Asian trading on Friday as investors looked to fresh catalysts after the Federal Reserve's meeting, with the greenback inching higher against the yen ahead of a policy decision from the Bank of Japan.】

item.title: 中国小米将修复 SU7 电动车软件问题，消除辅助驾驶安全隐患
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商小米将通过召回解决116,887辆SU7轿车的软件问题。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xiaomi will resolve software issues for 116,887 SU7 sedans through a recall due to insufficient early warnings when highway pilot assisted driving is activated, the market regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 桑托斯首席执行官表示，桑托斯随时准备考虑任何收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚天然气生产商桑托斯公司首席执行官凯文-加拉格尔（Kevin Gallagher）周五表示，桑托斯公司随时准备考虑任何收购该公司的提议。【原文：Santos is always prepared to consider any takeover offers for the company, the Australian gas producer's CEO Kevin Gallagher said on Friday, adding he would like to stay as CEO as long as he has the support of shareholders and the board.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 和股东在美国首次公开募股中筹资 3 亿美元
item.description: Pattern 及其现有股东周四在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 3 亿美元，此前这家电子商务公司的股票定价在市场范围内。【原文：Pattern and its existing shareholders raised $300 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Thursday, after the e-commerce firm priced its shares within the marketed range.】

item.title: 需求担忧盖过美国降息带来的利好，石油价格变化不大
item.description: 由于担心美国的燃料需求，在美国联邦储备委员会今年首次降息后的第二天，油价在上一交易日走低，周五变动不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Friday after settling lower in the previous session, the day after the U.S. Federal Reserve cut interest rates for the first time this year, due to worries about fuel demand in the United States.】

item.title: 巴西部长介入 JBS 奴隶劳动调查
item.description: 根据路透社看到的文件，巴西劳工部长路易斯-马里尼奥（Luiz Marinho）正在对一项调查进行不寻常的最终审查，该调查可能会将肉类包装商 JBS SA 的一个家禽部门列入黑名单，因为该部门的工人遭受了 "类似奴役的条件"。【原文：Brazilian Labor Minister Luiz Marinho is carrying out an unusual final review of an investigation that could blacklist a poultry unit of meatpacker JBS SA for subjecting workers to "slavery-like conditions," according to documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 英特尔与 Nvidia 的交易如何帮助英特尔实现下一代芯片制造
item.description: 分析师表示，英伟达（Nvidia）与英特尔（Intel）的交易可能会使这家陷入困境的芯片制造商的下一代制造技术站稳脚跟，即使这家人工智能芯片领导者没有直接承诺使用该技术制造自己的芯片。【原文：Nvidia's deal with Intel could put the struggling chipmaker's next-generation manufacturing technology on a stronger footing, even without a direct commitment from the AI chip leader to use that technology to make its own chips, analysts said.】

item.title: 消息人士和备忘录称，软银愿景基金将裁员 20%，转向大胆的人工智能押注
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录和一位熟悉该计划的消息人士透露，软银集团将在全球范围内裁掉近 20% 的愿景基金团队，因为该公司将把资源转移到创始人孙正义在美国的大规模人工智能赌注上。【原文：SoftBank Group will lay off nearly 20% of its Vision Fund team globally as it shifts resources to founder Masayoshi Son’s large-scale artificial intelligence bets in the United States, according to a memo seen by Reuters and a source familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 据CNBC报道，Nvidia斥资9亿多美元聘请Enfabrica公司首席执行官并获得技术许可
item.description: 据 CNBC 周四报道，英伟达（Nvidia）斥资 9 亿多美元聘请了 Enfabrica 首席执行官 Rochan Sankar 和这家人工智能硬件初创公司的其他员工，并获得了该公司的技术许可。【原文：Nvidia has spent over $900 million to hire Enfabrica CEO Rochan Sankar and other staff at the artificial intelligence hardware startup and to license the company's technology, CNBC reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 莱纳尔公布季度利润下降，因购房者承受压力过大
item.description: 房屋建筑商伦纳（Lennar）周四报告称，由于通胀压力继续拖累住房需求，该公司第三季度利润下降了 46%，并预计第四季度房屋交付量将低于华尔街预期。【原文：Homebuilder Lennar reported a 46% decline in third-quarter profit and forecast fourth-quarter home deliveries below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as inflationary pressures continued to weigh on housing demand.】
